item.title: 'Bonds' to replace all Runescape currency
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:46, topic:532542”][quote author=Mod Pips]

[ul][li]Wealth injected by gold farmers has dropped by 81%[/li]
[li]Quantity of real-world trades have dropped by 61%[/li]
[li]Volume of wealth real-world traded has dropped by 63%[/li][/ul]

[/quote][/quote]

This implies that Jagex knows who the gold farmers are. If you have that kind of info, why not just ban them all?
This also implies that Jagex knows how much gold has been traded. If they know where and how much gold is being sold, why not filed a suit against them and have those sites removed?

Sounds like a load of crap to me. Another failed attempt at creating a statistic or fact that Jagex has used to justify more microtransactions.

item.title: 'Bonds' to replace all Runescape currency
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:51, topic:532542”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=651334.msg4371313#msg4371313 date=1380746923]

[ul][li]Wealth injected by gold farmers has dropped by 81%[/li]
[li]Quantity of real-world trades have dropped by 61%[/li]
[li]Volume of wealth real-world traded has dropped by 63%[/li][/ul]

[/quote]

I don’t believe it because their statistics in their video were completely off. Just tossing numbers around like fools.[/quote]
I don’t have any reason to doubt them. As any business knows, you want to measure everything.
Real-world trades would stand out like a sore thumb; there aren’t many players who would trade a random player and suddenly give them 100m in return for very little or nothing. Not without a catalyst (read: payment in the real world). It wouldn’t be hard to identify all of these trades, with a certain margin for error. Similarly, it would be easy to identify a lack of these trades.

item.title: 'Bonds' to replace all Runescape currency
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:42, topic:532542”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=651334.msg4370285#msg4370285 date=1380466696]

I never thought that I would say RuneScape was P2W (or P4A), but I’m saying it.

You cannot prevent this as long as gold is important. People bought illegal gold before, now they can buy it legally.

That is mainly because Jagex became very complacent with the number of bots roaming Runescape. I do not think that players who legitimately gain GP and sell it is the problem, but moreso the collection of bots that farm gold and sell it for pure RL profit. If Jagex actually cared about ruining these GP sites, they would have just correctly initiated a system of removing bots, rather than promising us a new and improved Optimus system or whatever it was called which actually just lagged the servers and banned innocent players half the time.

OK smartass, give us the perfect system for banning bots.
[/quote]
That is not my job, as I am not getting paid to do so. If Jagex promises us this “like never before” system of banning bots, and then it comes back around and bans regular players and the bots continue to run rampant and fill up every training spot.

What you just said is like basically telling me that if I am unhappy with my president, I just need to run for president. Which is just stupid, because I have neither the credentials for either. However, at least I am not lying about it and promising that later on I will make one for you guys and then pretty much never deliver.[/quote]
Jagex have tried to get rid of the bots. It seems like you’re unsatisfied with their effort. If Optimus lagged the server and banned too many people, you can’t say that they haven’t used enough resources or haven’t been harsh enough.

Lets take your president analogy a step further. The people who oppose a politician/party often do have an alternative solution, you do not.

[quote=“4x4Chevrolet, post:43, topic:532542”]I think it’s a good idea personally, seeing as so many people buy gold anyways, this is kind of a safe way of doing it. I like how you can buy membership with gps now as well, this could even out the game some…

I only see one problem, won’t these sites just start selling bonds now? Cheaper than Jagex?[/quote]
All new bonds need to be bought from Jagex. So this will be balanced in the end.

item.title: 'Bonds' to replace all Runescape currency
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

kingman002:

I never thought that I would say RuneScape was P2W (or P4A), but I’m saying it.

It has been P2W since Squeal tickets became purchasable. I mean you could literally buy OP binded items for irl cash. That plus lamps basically meant you were buying xp and gear. Then when Solomon came out it turned into Pay to Update, where you basically had to buy quality graphical updates just so the animations would look as natural as the rest of the world.

Overall RS is just garbage. I do not regret all of the money and time I put into it, because in the end I have extremely fond memories of both the game and the players. However, I am glad I quit on the day of EoC. Should they ever decide to revert back to pre-EoC and work on legit updates and make the game more about adventuring and having fun, not grinding and buying your way to the top, I may come back. I will not spend 8 USD to play a half-assed game with no future.
